message.body: Hey. Do you remember your sophomore year, you had an engineering class with a group project and one of your teammates was a slacker?
I feel like I had a lot of those.
Why? Interviewing someone for the LDC?
No. Me and Eden met one. His name was Marko.
He's white and like your height?
I'm pretty sure I know who you're talking about.
My height yeah. He's half white half Asian.
went to Drexel and we said our best friend did. He asked for a name.
He said oh man don't mention me to him. He must hate me because we were on a team project together and I was the third wheel slacker.
That's funny. I remember having to work with him, but not the exact project.
Yeah it was funny. He definitely had an Oh Crap moment
Is that his full time thing?
No he's a grad student at Drexel now. He just helps his parents out on weekends
